/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the urban landscape. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their facades painted in a palette of red, brown, and gray, reflecting the architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the man-made structures below. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the vibrancy and energy of city life in Beijing.
